website_summaries.verdict: Large number of paintballs in one package, so you'll be ready for a long day of playing.
pros: Shells have red and silver colors with yellow paint inside
Reasonable price for a large quantity
cons: Some of the paintballs may arrive broken

customer_reviews.title: Good alternative to buying paintball at the range.
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping and none of the paintball had damage or dimple. We played in 90 degree weather and the paintball held up. A handful of the paintballs hit solid on opponent but did not break. Would buy again for my next outing.
customer_reviews.author: Seemeinacrown

customer_reviews.title: Great Paintballs
customer_reviews.text: Great Paintballs. Came at a reasonable time, and very few were broken during shipping. These are great quality paintballs that will break when you want then to break, as in when they hit an object. My only problem with them is they are a little pricey, but they are good quality so that doesn't matter.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: There were many dents in the balls. No broken ones, but not the quality I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Work great
customer_reviews.text: Typical paintballs, nothing special but they don't break like the cheap ones so they work well. Would use for fun
customer_reviews.author: brandon beausoleil

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These balls shoot extremely well in my Tippmann. No feeding problems. Accurate at 25 to 30 yards.
customer_reviews.author: John Smith

customer_reviews.title: good value or money
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good box O' balls for the money. I bought some different ones after these trying to save money! Should have stayed with these! Very little breakage, packaging was good! Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Ghent

customer_reviews.title: A little bit TOO "solid".
customer_reviews.text: Solid product, super safe shipment & good value. The only issue I have is I had a couple bounces instead of breaks.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Pricey
customer_reviews.text: No chopped balls or mid-air explosions so they worked very well. Pricey for 1000. I recently picked up a box of 2000 JT Competition paintballs for $35.00 and although not as good were a better value.
customer_reviews.author: HowzitUSA

customer_reviews.title: On time and on target!
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived in tack. No broken paint balls. On time delivery. Good product and packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Mad Max

customer_reviews.title: Good deal!!
customer_reviews.text: Seem to be good quality paint balls. They arrived and not one was broken. They hold up really well.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Good paintballs.
customer_reviews.text: I was pretty happy with these. All paintballs were intact when I got them. And they shot pretty well. None of them broke in my hopper either. Though you can actually get paintballs cheaper at the park.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Sowders

customer_reviews.title: good paint
customer_reviews.text: great paint i shoot the spyder mr100 and the spyder fenox and only had 2 balls break on me in the entire bag. the shipper was great too.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Shoot straight Paint balls
customer_reviews.text: By the way my son is yelling when he's playing Paintball, I take it that it worked well :)
customer_reviews.author: SharpSound

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend this Product
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase. No broken balls. Quality packing. Quality product. I'll purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: N.M.H.

customer_reviews.title: highly rcommended
customer_reviews.text: awesome a few of the balls were busted in shipping but great preformance
customer_reviews.author: patricia mckenna

customer_reviews.title: good solid balls. Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Packaged amazingly well. Would not hesitate to order more of this brand from this seller. The balls work great, no breakage, no pitting. Good solid balls.
customer_reviews.author: StaceyVic

customer_reviews.title: Great paintballs
customer_reviews.text: Used them a few weeks ago and they did what they are supposed to. They were great. No misshapen or bad markers that I have found so far.
customer_reviews.author: BEH

customer_reviews.title: A handful were busted in each bag, and though ...
customer_reviews.text: A handful were busted in each bag, and though they worked (having to clean the barrel a lot, I'll probably just buy in person to inspect the boxes. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: DMOsti

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Great paintballs. Shipped great. Great colors. Meets expectations. Wish there were l
customer_reviews.author: Mo Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great paintballs. My nephew loves paintball. This was a great buy
customer_reviews.author: Rocky

customer_reviews.title: Paintball Discounters, doing it right!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these paintballs from "Paintball Discounters" and are without out a doubt exactly as the description says! 2 bags of 500 balls and what really surprised me was that there were no broken balls and no damaged balls that really stuck out to the naked eye. They packaged them very well in a box that was completely full of foam peanuts, pretty sure I could drop the box from my stairwell and they wouldn't break. Very happy with it, and I'm sure when my brother gets these for his new paintball gun, he'll be happy as well!
customer_reviews.author: Devvin C.

customer_reviews.title: they were great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these paintballs, and budget paintballs. Do not by the cheap ones, buy these. The cheap ones break in the marker and clog it. The Wrek Elite Premiums did not do this, they were great!
customer_reviews.author: Michael K

customer_reviews.title: Woof
customer_reviews.text: Every ball was dented and there was some liquid on the walls of the bag so I cleaned them.
customer_reviews.author: David G.

customer_reviews.title: would defintiely recommend
customer_reviews.text: The paintballs were very carefully packaged. Not a single paintball was broken.
customer_reviews.author: Lucas L. Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Better deal than we could find locally! Great, no problems :)
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Had no problems with the balls, Had them shipped to CO (many states away). They were in better condition then the balls I bought at the store. I did not find a single broken ball in any of the 10000 balls I bought.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Fosdick

customer_reviews.title: but a huge waste of money for me
customer_reviews.text: Some were broke in shipment. We used in our gun and they didn't project, only spattered all over the gun. Very watery, not thicker paint. Sop r we've let them just sit in a box and I came across them. Just sitting even, so many broke open! I purchased two large bags, but a huge waste of money for me. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Kay

customer_reviews.title: yo
customer_reviews.text: Soooooooooooo much paintballs It will take my son jimmy so long to finhish.
customer_reviews.author: bernadette reilly

customer_reviews.title: POWERFUL!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best paintballs I have ever purchased. My son loves to play with the gun as do I.
customer_reviews.author: Isiaih fahn

customer_reviews.title: 4 star
customer_reviews.text: It came in a paintball box for paint then on another Amazon box but they have a little paint inside the paintball no breaks though
customer_reviews.author: Saul

customer_reviews.title: This paint arrived without any breaks in the bag. ...
customer_reviews.text: This paint arrived without any breaks in the bag. However with this paint I've had barrel breaks about 6 out of 10 shots. This paint failed in three different markers, 2 Tippman A5, and 1 alpha black.
customer_reviews.author: Randy silva

customer_reviews.title: perfect paintballs
customer_reviews.text: love these , never used this brand and i wasn't disappointed they work as they should and pop when they should
customer_reviews.author: boston

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: None of the paintballs were broke when I got it so far they are good
customer_reviews.author: Robert C

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: it came early which i loved i havnt had a chance to shoot but no broken balls and they were purple and orange shells they are perfectly round and i cant wait to see how they shoot i will definatley order again
customer_reviews.author: james123

customer_reviews.title: ... few busted one but other than that I was pleased.
customer_reviews.text: Had a few busted one but other than that I was pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Magan

customer_reviews.title: great balls
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. None broken when opened, shot decently, and broke on impact fairly easily. Only bad part is the snot green color inside. Looks like you got hit with a loogie, lol.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Parks

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't buy again.
customer_reviews.text: I shoot a d3fy d3s recently shot through this whole box just to get rid of them! Curved everywhere glad I only bought one box. The reason I'm leaving two stars is they did not break in my hopper or pods also some shots did go straight
customer_reviews.author: S. Bliss

customer_reviews.title: All around great
customer_reviews.text: Great price. My grandson goes through alot of paintballs and it's great to buy this quanity for a great price and shipping was super fast also.
customer_reviews.author: Debi

customer_reviews.title: Easy Target
customer_reviews.text: The Wrek Elite paintballs were shipped to my home ahead of schedule, which was quite nice. They weren't advertised as professional use paintballs, but they definitely shot like the more expensive brands. They arrived with no broken balls, unlike some of the other brands I have tried. I am on my 3rd order of Wrek Elite. Keep up the good work, and I will continue ordering.
customer_reviews.author: Ted E. Kinson

customer_reviews.title: Arrived safe
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived in good shape with all paint balls in working order. I would recommend these to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Casey

customer_reviews.title: paint balls
customer_reviews.text: these paint balls are ok. they are good for the price they give them to you for but you can find better ones.
customer_reviews.author: Flavor Steve

customer_reviews.title: great for target shooting.
customer_reviews.text: Great for targets, not to fire at others. These are pretty hard. When we have paint ball wars I change to a softer ball.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Arrived a day early, gave 1000 extra elite paint balls. Only one with a flaw. None broken.
customer_reviews.author: Koinonia

customer_reviews.title: Good paint, but.
customer_reviews.text: If you get a broken ball during shipping, it messes up the whole bag. After cleaning, all the balls in that bag were irregularly shaped. The other bag shoots very well. For the price, you would expect them to be able to handle some paint in the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Giant Mess
customer_reviews.text: Almost every single paintball was either broken or leaking upon arrival. What a mess. Never again.
customer_reviews.author: Nomad

customer_reviews.title: Worked fine
customer_reviews.text: Smelled worse than most but seemed to explode well and not much different from what was sold at field that I played at. Taste bad if you get shot in the grill but that is because I'm a sucky newb and not the product.
customer_reviews.author: Ozzie Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: they all shipped nice but.
customer_reviews.text: they all shipped nice but..... when i was in the field earlier today half of them either broke in my pods and hopper or jammed in my barrel. they are not worth the money. BUY A NAME BRAND!
customer_reviews.author: Marianna

customer_reviews.title: Great not to thick of a micro input so it ...
customer_reviews.text: Great not to thick of a micro input so it won't be disturbed by the multi cable on my Sony a7s perfect for field monitors.
customer_reviews.author: jonathan

customer_reviews.title: I liked em
customer_reviews.text: I like these they are hard which has it's pros and cons, i bought these and they shipped fast! The first time i used em i chopped the crap out of them but i just used a ton and didn't chop any more so i think it was my fault the first time! overall i would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Dkhrmn

customer_reviews.title: love the balls but....
customer_reviews.text: Make sure the park your playing at allows outside ammo. Otherwise your just using this for practice in your backyard or where ever. :(
customer_reviews.author: Avrom S.

customer_reviews.title: paintballs
customer_reviews.text: The product that i ordered arived but was not the very same order that i veiwed online when i purchased the item.
customer_reviews.author: Buildings unlimited/mimzy millz

customer_reviews.title: What is the ounce
customer_reviews.text: What is the ounce I need 0.68 for my gun
customer_reviews.author: Ben Ranson

product_meta.title: Wrek Elite Premium 1000 Count Paintballs
product_meta.description: Wrek your targets with great quality paintballs only available from Paintball-Discounters.com great quality shell with a bright fill that is easy to clean up.
